Class ClientHandlerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelHandler, ChannelHandlerUtil.SingleInboundMessageHandler<String>, ChannelInboundMessageHandler<String>, ChannelStateHandler

    public class ClientHandlerAdapter
extends ChannelInboundMessageHandlerAdapter<String>
    An inbound-only message handler to provide client functionality.

    1.0
